analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x562858eaa3c5af1ae79e33c225aff4e1562f8cce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/4/0x562858eaa3c5af1ae79e33c225aff4e1562f8cce.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x562858eaa3c5af1ae79e33c225aff4e1562f8cce.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
